participant_1.background:
Ballet is my passion, and I could never be a ballet dancer if I were blind.
my parents were scientists.
i recently proposed to my girlfriend of three years.
My puppy Tiki is a lot more coordinated than I am.
I'm worried about not being able to keep any food down and losing too much weight.

participant_2.background:
I spend my day engineering sustainable solutions for the environment while listening to the Rolling Stones.
i sometimes drive fast.
i think i need a vacation.
i sing many songs.
i do not know if i enjoy programming , or if its my only choice.

content.text: I'm a ballet dancer, and I recently proposed to my girlfriend of three years!
That's so exciting! Congrats! I'm a software engineer, and I'm not sure if I enjoy my job or if it's my only choice.
What's your favorite part of your job?
I love engineering sustainable solutions for the environment, but I'm not sure if I'm passionate about programming.
What's your favorite thing to do outside of work?
I love singing, and I sometimes like to drive fast.
That's cool! I love ballet, and I'm a big fan of the Rolling Stones.
I love the Rolling Stones too!
I'm a little worried about not being able to keep any food down and losing too much weight.
Oh no! I hope you get better soon.
Thanks! I think I need a vacation.
Me too! I'm going to take a few days off next week.
That sounds like a great idea
